this_title: American Faust: From Condi to Neo-Condi
trans_title: 美国浮士德：从康迪到新康迪
introduction: A documentary movie that portrays the life and career of former US Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice.There are exclusive interviews with three of Rice's most authoritative biographers: Marcus Mabry, an editor at the New York Times and author of Twice As Good: Condoleezza Rice and her path to power; Glenn Kessler, Pulitzer Prize winning journalist, diplomatic correspondent at the Washington Post and author of The Confidante: Condoleezza Rice and the Creation of the Bush Legacy; and Antonia Felix, author of Condi: The Condoleezza Rice Story.
chinese_title: 美国浮士德：从康迪到新康迪
foreign_title: American Faust: From Condi to Neo-Condi
